com.edugility.liquiunit

Class H2Archive

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.edugility.liquiunit.H2Archive

  • public class H2Archive
extends Object
    A special-purpose class that saves an in-memory H2 database as a String containing all the DML and DDL to reconstitute it.

    This class is designed for use only in light integration-testing scenarios.

    This class is safe for use by multiple threads.

    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    H2Rule, the SCRIPT command

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ReadWriteLock dataLock
      A ReadWriteLock used to protect access to the data stored as an archive of a given H2 database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      H2Archive()
      Creates a new H2Archive.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isEmpty(Description description)
      Returns true if, for the supplied Description, this H2Archive is conceptually "empty"—devoid of archive data that could be loaded.
      boolean loadUnlessEmpty(Description description, Connection c)
      Uses any stored DML or DDL commands this H2Archive encapsulates (saved earlier by the saveIfEmpty(Description, Connection) method) to populate the in-memory H2 database represented and attached to by the supplied Connection.
      boolean saveIfEmpty(Description description, Connection c)
      Provided that no archive data currently exists, atomically saves the state of the H2 database reachable via the supplied Connection as the newline-separated output of the H2 SCRIPT command.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • dataLock

        protected final ReadWriteLock dataLock
        A ReadWriteLock used to protect access to the data stored as an archive of a given H2 database.

        This field is never null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • H2Archive

        public H2Archive()
        Creates a new H2Archive.

    • Method Detail

      • saveIfEmpty

        public boolean saveIfEmpty(Description description,
                           Connection c)
                    throws SQLException
        Provided that no archive data currently exists, atomically saves the state of the H2 database reachable via the supplied Connection as the newline-separated output of the H2 SCRIPT command.

        If this method has been called before, then a subsequent invocation will not overwrite any existing data.

        Parameters:
        description - the Description describing the current JUnit test underway; ignored by this implementation but may be useful for subclasses; may be null
        c - a Connection to an in-memory H2 database; must not be null; must be valid
        Returns:
        true if a save actually occurred; false if no action was taken
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if c is null
        IllegalStateException - if the supplied Connection is not valid
        SQLException - if a database error occurs
        See Also:
        loadUnlessEmpty(Description, Connection)

      • loadUnlessEmpty

        public boolean loadUnlessEmpty(Description description,
                               Connection c)
                        throws SQLException
        Uses any stored DML or DDL commands this H2Archive encapsulates (saved earlier by the saveIfEmpty(Description, Connection) method) to populate the in-memory H2 database represented and attached to by the supplied Connection.
        Parameters:
        description - the Description describing the current JUnit test underway; ignored by this implementation but may be useful for subclasses; may be null
        c - a Connection to an in-memory H2 database; must not be null; must be valid
        Returns:
        true if the state of the database was altered; false otherwise
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if c is null
        IllegalStateException - if the supplied Connection is not valid
        SQLException - if a database error occurs
        See Also:
        saveIfEmpty(Description, Connection)

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty(Description description)
        Returns true if, for the supplied Description, this H2Archive is conceptually "empty"—devoid of archive data that could be loaded.
        Parameters:
        description - the Description describing the current JUnit test underway; ignored by this implementation but may be useful for subclasses; may be null
        Returns:
        true if this H2Archive is conceptually empty with regards to the supplied Description; false otherwise
        See Also:
        loadUnlessEmpty(Description, Connection)
